about_me.title: About Me
description: I have over 5 years of PHP development experience, primarily working with PHP 7.4+, Yii2, and Laravel. I contributed to maintaining and enhancing CRM systems, fintech projects, and client websites, also developing CMS plugins. My responsibilities include bug fixing, feature development, troubleshooting, and code reviews.

Currently, as a Middle PHP Developer, I focus on improving system stability, collaborating with the team on complex issues, and maintaining high code quality. I use technologies such as PHP, Yii2, Laravel, MySQL, and Git regularly.
I aim to further develop my expertise in PHP frameworks, deepen my skills in backend architecture and performance optimization.

companies.name: "WOW" Corp.
description: Maintained and enhanced an internal CRM system (Yii2) for company users, including bug fixes, and implementation of new features.
Supported a fintech project (Yii2) by troubleshooting issues and developing new functionality.
Developed a questionnaire website using Laravel.
Collaborated with the team to resolve complex technical issues and improve system stability.
Conducted code reviews to maintain code quality and ensure adherence to best practices.

additional.title: Additional Information
info: Participated in the Ukrainian Collegiate Programming Contest 2016.
Has finished the mixed course "Foundations of Programming (based on Harvard CS50 course)". Certificate S/N: TN-0196.

achievements.title: Achievements
info: Developed custom user interfaces with Vue 3 using the Composition API, improving usability and reducing onboarding time for new users.
Optimized complex SQL queries and database structures, reducing report generation time from minutes to seconds.
Acted as a mentor for a team of 2-3 developers, introduced code review processes and best practices, which improved code quality and accelerated new hire onboarding.
